mapper.select: SELECT homework_no homeworkNo ,homework_title homeworkTitle ,lecture_no lectureNo ,member_id memberId ,homework_content homeworkContent ,homework_create_date homeworkCreateDate ,homework_start_date homeworkStartDate ,homework_end_date homeworkEndDate FROM homework WHERE homework_no = #{homeworkNo}

SELECT hs.homework_submit_no homeworkSubmitNo ,h.homework_no homeworkNo ,hs.member_id memberId ,h.lecture_no lectureNo ,hs.homework_submit_title homeworkSubmitTitle
,hs.homework_submit_create_date homeworkSubmitCreateDate ,hs.homework_submit_update_date homeworkSubmitUpdateDate FROM homework_submit hs RIGHT JOIN homework h ON hs.homework_no = h.homework_no LEFT JOIN homework_submit_file hsf ON hs.homework_submit_no = hsf.homework_submit_no WHERE hs.homework_no = #{homeworkNo} GROUP BY hs.homework_submit_no ORDER BY hs.homework_submit_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT hs.homework_submit_no homeworkSubmitNo ,hs.homework_no homeworkNo ,h.lecture_no lectureNo ,hs.member_id memberId ,hs.homework_submit_title homeworkSubmitTitle ,hs.homework_submit_content homeworkSubmitContent ,hs.homework_submit_score homeworkSubmitScore ,hs.homework_submit_feedback homeworkSubmitFeedback ,hs.homework_submit_create_date homeworkSubmitCreateDate ,hs.homework_submit_update_date homeworkSubmitUpdateDate FROM homework_submit hs INNER JOIN homework h ON hs.homework_no = h.homework_no WHERE hs.homework_submit_no = #{homeworkSubmitNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM homework_submit WHERE homework_no = #{homeworkNo}

SELECT homework_submit_file_no homeworkSubmitFileNo ,homework_submit_no homeworkSubmitNo ,homework_submit_file_name homeworkSubmitFileName ,homework_submit_file_original homeworkSubmitFileOriginal ,homework_submit_file_size homeworkSubmitFileSize ,homework_submit_file_type homeworkSubmitFileType ,homework_submit_file_create_date homeworkSubmitFileCreateDate ,homework_submit_file_update_date homeworkSubmitFileUpdateDate FROM homework_submit_file homeworkSubmitFile WHERE homework_submit_no = #{homeworkSubmitNo}
SELECT homework_submit_file_name homeworkSubmitFileName FROM homework_submit_file WHERE homework_submit_no = #{homeworkSubmitNo}
